item.description:
Hi, Everybody:

Let's enjoy our monthly Italian lunch today   Just click on Anjon's above, which will lead you to the link to their website and their delicious and very reasonably priced luncheon menu!  We always have an enjoyable time here, and I have programmed this to repeat every 4 weeks for the summer months.

Any questions, let me know.  Hope to see you there!

Randy

 

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: Until 11:45, we'll meet near silver Subaru Forester in parking lot. After 11:45, ask for Randy.
item.name: Italian at Anjons!
